==Trivia ==
*''Tlapal'' could correspond with {{wt|Tlapalli}} meaning "dye" or [https://nahuatl.wired-humanities.org/content/tlapal Tlapal] meaning "on the side" both words of {{w|Nahuatl}} origins.
